name: Grilled Squash with Piquant Sauce
author: reddbarren
summary: This is a wonderful way to liven up those summer squashes. Slices are grilled with a seasoned bread crumb coating and then served with a dollop of sauce on each slice. An excellent side dish variety, especially for meals featuring grilled meat.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil, or as needed
directions: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Place squash in a bowl; drizzle with olive oil
Place bread crumbs in a separate bowl; dredge squash in bread crumbs until well coated
Cook squash on preheated grill until browned, 2 to 3 minutes per side
Whisk mayonnaise, yogurt, taco sauce, chile paste, and paprika together in a bowl
Top each cooked squash slice with a dollop of mayonnaise mixture
